summary: Standalone set of Ancient Nord Armor classified as Light Armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod includes a standalone set of Ancient Nord Armor that is classified as Light Armor. It is craftable and upgradeable (as Studded Armor). Stats are similar to Glass Armor. Includes cuirass, gloves, boots, and helmet.

This mod does not affect the standard Ancient Nord Armor, so NPC\'s who wear it will still have it and benefit from their Heavy Armor skills.

Permission is granted for anyone to use this mod. Just include a note that I created the original version.
author: danbuter
